nodes.bodyText: The setup code per test function is very similar, and we could bundle it together in a helper class. Something to consider for upcoming work.
I have noticed the same, will do on next encounter.

nodes.bodyText: Since this used to be an inner loop, consider renaming j to i to better mesh with naming expectations
